comment.author: 74784995@N00
comment._content: This is a DC-3 of KLM painted neutrality orange with HOLLAND marked on the roof winter 1939/1940...looks like its on a frozen lake This aircraft had been shot up by the Luftwaffe over the North Sea prior to being painted orange...it was later captured by the Germans in 1940 and pressed into service read forum.12oclockhigh.net/showthread.php?t=18530
